overview: The story is about Sam being tricked into making an MLM investment led by Ray. Sam met with his good friend Malik, a real estate broker, to borrow money for investment capital, but failed. Sam had to borrow money from a violent moneylender named Branco. After Sam realizes he has been tricked by Ray, Sam takes his family to see Malik to escape from Branco. Malik has ordered Sam & his Family to go to the old Hotel he just bought to hide. But unfortunately for Sam since the Hotel was operating, various strange events happened at the hotel. Apparently the hotel has been cursed by a demon that was worshiped at one point in the past. What will happen to Sam and the family? Will Branco get his money back?
title: Sumpahan Syaitan
